title: Get an additional 20% off this stock screening and education app
description:
The stock market can be intimidating, especially if you don’t have much investment experience. That’s why a tool like Tykr Stock Screener is so valuable. This intuitive app has a 4.9/5-star rating on Trustpilot because it helps novice and expert investors alike learn about the market and make more informed investment decisions.

Through March 10th, you can get a lifetime Premium Plan for an extra 20% off at just $95.99 with code ENJOY20.
